description: Beautiful Bottom Boy Jerek (remember his talented hole and HUGEcock in Probe?) is paired with he-man macho stud Eric Evans. Eric,the hottest hairy porn star of all time, has decided to focus his careeron the hard-core action that he enjoys in his private life. In Drilled, heshows how excellent his topping skills are, and Jerek has the talent totake Eric's giant fist like a pro. Watching Eric's body-builder hairyarms working over boy toy Jerek is one of the high points of thismovie. To bring an added twist to the scene, Director Ward found ahuge, 400lb iron dog cage that looks like a 4 x 6 foot prison cell.Jerek, our bottom, is inside the cage, while Eric delivers his fistingthru the steel bars. The two are separated from each other, their onlyconnection being between fist and hole. Halfway thru, the scenemakes a remarkable change, but we will not give away the endinghere! This scene is another home run and everyone at RagingStallion Studios is thrilled to welcome Eric Evans into the world ofhandball action!
title: Toolbox 1 - Drilled, Scene #04
